comment: Main text block with vertical columns of Chinese characters, including large seal script characters at the top (e.g., '皇', '宀'), followed by smaller regular script explanations. The text is arranged in traditional right-to-left format. Contains annotations such as '文十五 重三' and phonetic notes like '高墳也从勹 系聲知隴切'. There are also marginal notes on the right edge: '小二十三', '說文大上', '洪章'. The entire block is enclosed in a thick black border.
